txt.en: Call Hórin and talk to him or speak to him back at Fellgát
DNT - 'Klúso said he saw some goblins skittering around here, stealing goods from the Ice-giants. If we stop these thieves, perhaps we will earn some favor among the Ice-giants.'
Goblin looters have been spotted stealing from the ice-giants in Thyrstáth.\n\nYou should defeat goblin looters.

Use the summoning horn to call Hórin to your side.

You should talk to Hórin. 

If Hórin is no longer with you, you can find him at Fellgát.
'There's few things I hate more than thieves. Goblin thieves? Now those are just the worst. Hopefully the ice-giants will appreciate this.'

You found a goblin sneaking around during all the fighting in Thyrstáth, taking advantage of the chaos to steal from the ice-giants. Defeating the looters may help prove your worthiness to the giants.
Goblin looters are using the battle as an opportunity to steal from the ice-giants.
'There's few things I hate more than thieves. Goblin thieves? Now those are just the worst. Hopefully the ice-giants will appreciate this.'
